author: James Tanner
method: For the stir-fried vegetables, in a hot wok add the sesame oil, chilli and aubergine.  Cook for three minutes and add the reminder of the ingredients and cook for a further minute. For the omelette, in a bowl mix all the ingredients for the omelette together. In a medium-sized non-stick frying pan place the mixture into the pan and cook for two minutes over a medium heat. Add into it the stir-fried vegetables and fold the omelette over, cook for a further minute and serve.
ingredients: 1 small aubergine, cut into chunks,  1 red chilli, diced,  2 tbsp sesame oil,  75g/2Â¾oz tofu, cut into small cubes,  1 tbsp sesame seeds,  1 tbsp soy sauce,  1 lime, juice only,  3 free-range eggs,  50ml/2fl oz coconut milk,  1 tbsp sesame oil,  1 tbsp soy sauce
